name: HubSpot to Kit - Weekly Sync Contacts

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ filterGroups: [{ filters: [{ propertyName: 'createdate', operator: 'GTE', value: String($('Get Last Sync Timestamp').first().json.lastSyncTimestamp) }] }], properties: ['firstname', 'email', 'product_list', 'lifecyclestage', 'hs_lead_status', 'website', 'dr_code', 'hs_country_region_code', 'city', 'jf_usercat', 'ist_lead_source'], sorts: [{ propertyName: 'createdate', direction: 'ASCENDING' }], limit: 100, after: $json.paginationCursor || '0' }) }}

={
  "email_address": "{{ $json.email }}",
  "first_name": "{{ $json.first_name }}",
  "state": "active",
  "fields": {
    "Product List": "{{ $json.product_list }}",
    "Lifecycle Stage": "{{ $json.lifecycle_stage }}",
    "Lead Status": "{{ $json.lead_status }}",
    "Website": "{{ $json.website }}",
    "DR Code": "{{ $json.dr_code }}",
    "Country Region Code": "{{ $json.country_region_code }}",
    "City": "{{ $json.city }}",
    "JF UserCat": "{{ $json.jf_usercat }}",
    "IST Lead Source": "{{ $json.ist_lead_source }}"
  }
}
